name: DiabeticNephropathy
title: Diabetic Nephropathy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  diabetic nephropathy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis for diabetic nephropathy.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
